title: Baseline Survey (Draft)
introduction:
Thank you for taking the time to participate in this survey of SamaHub workers. The purpose of this survey is to better understand the background and demographics of our workers in order to continue to deliver the best work opportunities through the SamaHub. 

There are no ‘wrong’ answers and all information collected will be strictly private and anonymous at the individual level. The survey is comprised of a total of 55 short questions and will take approximately 25 minutes to complete. 

SamaHub workers will be surveyed regularly (1-2 times a year) through the SamaHub; additionally, with the permission of the respondent, a selection of SamaHub workers may also be contacted in-person or via telephone for questions.

questions.title: What is the name of your work center?
What is your current marital status?

type.name: dropdown,
answers: Never married and do not live with a boyfriend/girlfriend

questions.title: Where is your current residence located?
How many members are in your household? Please include members that are temporarily absent (for example for study or work), but who normally sleep and/or eat their meals in the household?
questions.additional_info:
Household members include the following:
- Anyone who has been living in your household for 6 months or longer
- Anyone who has been staying in your household for less than 6 months but plans to stay in your household for 6 or more months
- Anyone who has lived in your household for at least 6 months but has now been away for less than 6 months

Household members do NOT include the following:
- Anyone who has left the household permanently (examples include those who have left for marriage or who have left the city/village), even if they left less than 6 months ago
